notes.text:
An update is available for module.slf4j, xerces-j2, javassist, xml-commons-resolver, xml-commons-apis, module.jackson-jaxrs-providers, module.xsom, apache-commons-lang, velocity, module.apache-commons-collections, jackson-core, module.stax-ex, module.jackson-core, pki-core, jackson-jaxrs-providers, module.xerces-j2, ldapjdk, module.apache-commons-net, module.glassfish-jaxb-api, apache-commons-net, xmlstreambuffer, module.jackson-annotations, module.pki-core, relaxngDatatype, resteasy, apache-commons-collections, module.relaxngDatatype, module.jackson-databind, module.ldapjdk, module.jss, glassfish-jaxb-api, glassfish-jaxb, slf4j, module.velocity, tomcatjss, module.resteasy, module.xml-commons-apis, stax-ex, module.xalan-j2, pki-servlet-engine, jakarta-commons-httpclient, jackson-databind, xalan-j2, module.javassist, module.tomcatjss, module.bea-stax, module.pki-servlet-engine, bea-stax, jss, module.xmlstreambuffer, xsom, module.glassfish-fastinfoset, module.glassfish-jaxb, jackson-annotations, module.jakarta-commons-httpclient, module.xml-commons-resolver, module.apache-commons-lang, glassfish-fastinfoset.
This update affects Rocky Linux 8.
A Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) base score, which gives a detailed severity rating, is available for each vulnerability from the CVE list
notes.title: Topic

notes.text:
The Public Key Infrastructure (PKI) Core contains fundamental packages required by Rocky Enterprise Software Foundation Certificate System.

Security Fix(es):

* jackson-databind: denial of service via a large depth of nested objects (CVE-2020-36518)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

Additional Changes:

For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Rocky Linux 8.10 Release Notes linked from the References section.

This advisory is provided by Ctrl IQ, Inc for Rocky Linux systems. For more information about CIQ security practices, visit https://ciq.com/security.
notes.title: Description
